trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows text box control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controlo de caixa de texto do Windows.

trans-unit.source: With the TextBox control, the user can enter text in an application.
trans-unit.target: Com o controlo de caixa de texto, o utilizador pode introduzir texto numa aplicação.

trans-unit.source: This control has additional functionality that is not found in the standard Windows text box control, including multiline editing and password character masking.
trans-unit.target: Este controlo tem funcionalidades adicionais que não se encontra na padrão Windows texto caixa controlo, incluindo a edição de múltiplas linhas e máscaras de caracteres de palavra-passe.

trans-unit.source: Typically, a TextBox control is used to display, or accept as input, a single line of text.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um controlo de caixa de texto é utilizado para apresentar ou aceita como entrada, uma única linha de texto.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A> properties to enable multiple lines of text to be displayed or entered.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A>Propriedades para ativar várias linhas de texto sejam apresentadas ou introduzido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> properties to `true` to enable greater text manipulation in a multiline TextBox control.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>Propriedades `true` para permitir maior manipulação de texto num controlo de caixa de texto com várias linhas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property to `true` to adjust the height of the TextBox control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>propriedade `true` para ajustar a altura do controlo de caixa de texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can adjust the height by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode ajustar a altura, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can limit the amount of text entered into a TextBox control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property to a specific number of characters.
trans-unit.target: Pode limitar a quantidade de texto introduzido para um controlo de caixa de texto, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>propriedade para um número específico de carateres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: TextBox controls can also be used to accept passwords and other sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: Controlos da caixa de texto também podem ser utilizados para aceitar as palavras-passe e outras informações confidenciais.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property to mask characters entered in a single-line version of the control.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>propriedade e carateres de máscara introduzido numa versão de linha única do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to enable the user to type only uppercase, only lowercase, or a combination of uppercase and lowercase characters into the TextBox control.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>propriedade para permitir que o utilizador para o tipo só letras maiúsculas, minúsculas apenas, ou uma combinação de carateres em maiúsculas e minúsculas para o controlo de caixa de texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>

trans-unit.source: To scroll the contents of the TextBox until the cursor (caret) is within the visible region of the control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ScrollToCaret%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Desloque o conteúdo da caixa de texto até o cursor (acento circunflexo) na região visível do controlo, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ScrollToCaret%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ScrollToCaret%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a range of text in the text box, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para selecionar um intervalo de texto na caixa de texto, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Select%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: To restrict text from being entered in a TextBox control, you can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event in order to validate each character entered in the control.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir que o texto a ser introduzidos num controlo de caixa de texto, pode criar um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>eventos para validar cada caráter introduzido no controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: You can also restrict all entry of data in a TextBox control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Também pode restringir a todos os entrada de dados num controlo de caixa de texto, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Most of the functionality of the TextBox control is inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A maioria das funcionalidades do controlo de caixa de texto é herdada a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>

trans-unit.source: > > Using the TextBox control with visual styles enabled will cause the incorrect handling of surrogate fonts.
trans-unit.target: >> Utilizar o controlo de caixa de texto com estilos visuais ativados fará com que o processamento incorreto de tipos de letra de substituição.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The parent container control defines the color and font settings for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de contentor principal define as definições de cor e o tipo de letra para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing ENTER in a multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control creates a new line of text in the control or activates the default button for the form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se premindo ENTER no múltiplas linhas <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controlo cria uma nova linha de texto no controlo ou ativa o botão predefinido para o formulário.

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is `false`, the user must press CTRL+ENTER to create a new line in a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor desta propriedade é `false`, o utilizador deve premir CTRL + ENTER para criar uma nova linha no múltiplas linhas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If there is no default button for the form, the ENTER key will always create a new line of text in the control, regardless of the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum botão predefinido para o formulário, a tecla ENTER sempre irá criar uma nova linha de texto no controlo, independentemente do valor desta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ENTER key creates a new line of text in a multiline version of the control; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the ENTER key activates the default button for the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a tecla ENTER cria uma nova linha de texto numa versão multilinha do controlo; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a tecla ENTER ativa o botão predefinido para o formulário.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> to use when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomSource" name="CustomSource" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um personalizado <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"> </xref> utilizar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*>propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomSource" name="CustomSource" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*>

trans-unit.source: Use the AutoCompleteCustomSource, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o AutoCompleteCustomSource <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>Propriedades para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>automaticamente que conclui as cadeias de entrada ao comparar o prefixo que está a ser introduzido para os prefixos de todas as cadeias de uma origem de manter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlos em que os URLs, endereços, os nomes de ficheiros ou comandos serão frequentemente introduzidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The use of the AutoCompleteCustomSource property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to `CustomSource` in order to use AutoCompleteCustomSource.
trans-unit.target: A utilização da propriedade AutoCompleteCustomSource é opcional, mas tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>propriedade `CustomSource` para poder utilizar AutoCompleteCustomSource.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: Tem de utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>Propriedades em conjunto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O sistema operativo poderá limitar o número de cadeias personalizados que poder apresentar em simultâneo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> to use with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> to use with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an option that controls how automatic completion works for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma opção que controla a conclusão automática como funciona para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, AutoCompleteMode, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, AutoCompleteMode, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>Propriedades para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>automaticamente que conclui as cadeias de entrada ao comparar o prefixo que está a ser introduzido para os prefixos de todas as cadeias de uma origem de manter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlos em que os URLs, endereços, os nomes de ficheiros ou comandos serão frequentemente introduzidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to `CustomSource` in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A utilização do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>propriedade é opcional, mas tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>propriedade `CustomSource` para poder utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must use the AutoCompleteMode and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: Tem de utilizar o AutoCompleteMode e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>Propriedades em conjunto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O sistema operativo poderá limitar o número de cadeias personalizados que poder apresentar em simultâneo.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The following are the values.
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se os valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref> Appends the remainder of the most likely candidate string to the existing characters, highlighting the appended characters.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>Acrescenta o resto da cadeia de candidatos mais provável para os carateres existentes, realçando os carateres anexados.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref> Displays the auxiliary drop-down list associated with the edit control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>Apresenta a auxiliar na lista pendente associada ao controlo de edição.

trans-unit.source: This drop-down is populated with one or more suggested completion strings.
trans-unit.target: Esta lista pendente é preenchida com uma ou mais cadeias de conclusão sugeridos.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref> Appends both <xref uid="langword_csharp_Suggest" name="Suggest" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Append" name="Append" href=""></xref> options.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>Acrescenta ambos <xref uid="langword_csharp_Suggest" name="Suggest" href=""> </xref> e <xref uid="langword_csharp_Append" name="Append" href=""> </xref> opções.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref> Disables automatic completion.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>Desativa a conclusão automática.

trans-unit.source: This is the default.
trans-unit.target: Esta é a predefinição.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um dos valores de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the source of complete strings used for automatic completion.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica a origem das cadeias completas utilizadas para a conclusão automática.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and AutoCompleteSource properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>e a AutoCompleteSource propriedades para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>automaticamente que conclui as cadeias de entrada ao comparar o prefixo que está a ser introduzido para os prefixos de todas as cadeias de uma origem de manter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlos em que os URLs, endereços, os nomes de ficheiros ou comandos serão frequentemente introduzidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the AutoCompleteSource property to `CustomSource` in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A utilização do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>propriedade é opcional, mas tem de definir a propriedade AutoCompleteSource como `CustomSource` para poder utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and AutoCompleteSource properties together.
trans-unit.target: Tem de utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>e propriedades de AutoCompleteSource em conjunto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > AutoCompleteSource does not work on multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > AutoCompleteSource não funciona em múltiplas linhas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that can be displayed at once.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O sistema operativo poderá limitar o número de cadeias personalizadas que podem ser apresentadas em simultâneo.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The options are <xref uid="langword_csharp_AllSystemSources" name="AllSystemSources" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_AllUrl" name="AllUrl" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_FileSystem" name="FileSystem" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_HistoryList" name="HistoryList" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_RecentlyUsedList" name="RecentlyUsedList" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomSource" name="CustomSource" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The options are <xref uid="langword_csharp_AllSystemSources" name="AllSystemSources" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_AllUrl" name="AllUrl" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_FileSystem" name="FileSystem" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_HistoryList" name="HistoryList" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_RecentlyUsedList" name="RecentlyUsedList" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomSource" name="CustomSource" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um dos valores de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control modifies the case of characters as they are typed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controlo modifica as maiúsculas e minúsculas de carateres como estas são escritas.

trans-unit.source: You can use the CharacterCasing property to change the case of characters as required by your application.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar a propriedade CharacterCasing para alterar o caso dos carateres conforme exigido pela sua aplicação.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could change the case of all characters entered in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control used for password entry to uppercase or lowercase to enforce a policy for passwords.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode alterar o caso de todos os carateres que introduziu num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlo utilizado para a entrada de palavra-passe em maiúsculas ou minúsculas para impor uma política de palavras-passe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CharacterCasing"></xref> enumeration values that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control modifies the case of characters.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CharacterCasing"> </xref> valores de enumeração que especifica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controlo modifica as maiúsculas e minúsculas de carateres.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_CharacterCasing.Normal" name="CharacterCasing.Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_CharacterCasing.Normal" name="CharacterCasing.Normal" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: Foi atribuído um valor que não está dentro do intervalo de valores válidos para a enumeração para a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os parâmetros de criação necessários quando o identificador de controlo é criado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> que contém os parâmetros de criação necessários quando o identificador do controlo é criado.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is an input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a chave especificada é uma entrada chave ou uma chave especial que requer pré-processamentos.

trans-unit.source: The IsInputKey method returns `true` when `keyData` includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O método IsInputKey devolve `true` quando `keyData` inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>valor e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>

trans-unit.source: One of the key's values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores da chave.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is an input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave especificada é uma entrada chave; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se se trata de múltiplas linhas <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> does not work on multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>não funciona em múltiplas linhas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the font is changed, any indentation that you have defined does not appear.
trans-unit.target: Quando o tipo de letra é alterado, não aparece qualquer avanço que foram definidos.

trans-unit.source: To get indentation, set Multiline to `true` and override WM_SETFONT without calling the base class so that SETMARGINS is not called.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o avanço, defina múltiplas `true` e substituir WM_SETFONT sem chamar a classe base para que SETMARGINS não for chamado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is a multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo de múltiplas linhas <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controlar; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnBackColorChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnBackColorChanged também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnFontChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnFontChanged também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: When the user selects text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, the control saves the selection.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador seleciona o texto um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlo, o controlo guarda a seleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control gets focus, the selection is the same as when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> loses focus.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlo obtém o foco, a seleção é a mesma quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>perde o foco.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> gets focus for the first time, the entire text is selected.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>obtém focar-se pela primeira vez, o texto completo está selecionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.target: O método OnGotFocus também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlignChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnTextAlignChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnTextAlignChanged também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character used to mask characters of a password in a single-line <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caráter utilizado para carateres de máscara de uma palavra-passe numa linha única <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> property has precedence over the PasswordChar property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>propriedade tem precedência sobre a propriedade de PasswordChar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> is set to `true`, the default system password character is used and any character set by PasswordChar is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>está definido como `true`, é utilizado o carácter de palavra-passe de sistema predefinido e qualquer caráter definido por PasswordChar é ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the PasswordChar property is set, cut and copy actions in the control using the keyboard cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade de PasswordChar é definida, não não possível efetuar ações de cortar e copie o controlo com o teclado.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in password mode because PasswordChar, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>está no modo de palavra-passe porque PasswordChar, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>é `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>está no modo restrito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is disabled, but the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is cached so that it can be restored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> ever becomes unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: Neste modo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>é desativado mas atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>é colocado em cache para que pode ser restaurado se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>ficar sem restrições.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: Toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is a common scenario.
trans-unit.target: Ativando ou desativando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>é um cenário comum.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is shadowed while the control is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>é sombreado enquanto o controlo está no modo restrito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: From the designer perspective, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> value shown is the actual value.
trans-unit.target: Da perspetiva estruturador, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>valor apresentado é o valor real.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: The character used to mask characters entered in a single-line <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O caráter utilizado para carateres de máscara introduzidos numa linha única <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Set the value of this property to 0 (character value) if you do not want the control to mask characters as they are typed.
trans-unit.target: Defina o valor desta propriedade como 0 (valor de caráter) se não pretender que o controlo e carateres de máscara como estas são escritas.

trans-unit.source: Equals 0 (character value) by default.
trans-unit.target: Igual a 0 (valor de caráter) por predefinição.

trans-unit.source: Sets the selected text to the specified text without clearing the undo buffer.
trans-unit.target: Define o texto seleccionado para o texto especificado sem limpar a memória intermédia de anulação.

trans-unit.source: Unlike setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectedText%2A>, Paste does not affect the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário da definição <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectedText%2A>, colar não afeta a área de transferência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectedText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text to replace.
trans-unit.target: O texto a substituir.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Os processos de uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: New in 4.6.1.
trans-unit.target: Novo no 4.6.1.

trans-unit.source: In previous versions, the Ctrl-A shortcut key in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> failed to select all text when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> properties were both set to `true.`.
trans-unit.target: Em versões anteriores, a tecla de atalho de Ctrl-A num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>falhou para selecionar todo o texto quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>propriedades foram definidas como `true.`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: This method enables the Ctrl-A shortcut key to select all text when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> properties are both set to `true.` Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.0 through 4.6 can take advantage of this method by adding the following to the `<runtime>` section of the app.config file: ```xml <AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" /> ``` Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.6.1 or newer can opt out of this behavior by adding the following to the `<runtime>` section of the app.config file: ```xml <AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=true" /> ``` > [!NOTE] > If the app.config file already contains an `AppContextSwitchOverrides` key, merge the new key value into the existing key.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite a tecla de atalho Ctrl-A para selecionar todo o texto quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>propriedades são definidas como `true.` aplicações destinados a versões de .NET Framework 4.0 através de 4.6 podem tirar partido deste método, adicionando o seguinte para o `<runtime>` secção do ficheiro App. config: ```xml <AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" /> ``` aplicações direcionado para versões do .NET Framework 4.6.1 ou mais recente podem par excluir este comportamento, adicionando o seguinte para o `<runtime>` secção do ficheiro App. config : ```xml <AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=true" /> ``` > [!NOTE] > Se o ficheiro App. config já contém um `AppContextSwitchOverrides` chave, intercale o novo valor de chave a chave existente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `<AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "oldKey=oldValue;Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" />`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, `<AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "oldKey=oldValue;Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" />`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, transmitida por referência que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the shortcut key to process.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a tecla de atalho para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the command key was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave do comando foi processada pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which scroll bars should appear in a multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a deslocar barras deve aparecer na múltiplas linhas <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Horizontal scroll bars will not be shown if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> property is set to `true`, regardless of the value of the ScrollBars property.
trans-unit.target: Barras de deslocamento horizontal não serão apresentadas se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, independentemente do valor da propriedade barras de deslocamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref> enumeration values that indicates whether a multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control appears with no scroll bars, a horizontal scroll bar, a vertical scroll bar, or both.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"> </xref> valores de enumeração que indica se um múltiplas <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controlo é apresentado nenhum barras de deslocamento, uma barra de deslocamento horizontal, uma barra de deslocamento vertical ou ambos.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScrollBars.None" name="ScrollBars.None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScrollBars.None" name="ScrollBars.None" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: Foi atribuído um valor que não está dentro do intervalo de valores válidos para a enumeração para a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto associado este controlo.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: O texto associado este controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how text is aligned in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a forma como o texto é alinhado num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to align the text within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> to match the layout of text on your form.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para alinhar o texto dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>para fazer corresponder o esquema do texto do formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, if your controls are all located on the right side of the form, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TextAlign%2A> property to `HorizontalAlignment.Right`, and the text will be aligned with the right side of the control instead of the default left alignment.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se os controlos estão localizados no lado direito do formulário, pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TextAlign%2A>propriedade `HorizontalAlignment.Right`, e o texto irá ser alinhado com o lado direito de controlo, em vez do alinhamento esquerdo predefinido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TextAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> enumeration values that specifies how text is aligned in the control.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> valores de enumeração que especifica a forma como o texto é alinhado no controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlignment.Left" name="HorizontalAlignment.Left" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlignment.Left" name="HorizontalAlignment.Left" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: Foi atribuído um valor que não está dentro do intervalo de valores válidos para a enumeração para a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign*>propriedade foi alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control should appear as the default password character.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o texto a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controlo deve aparecer como carácter de palavra-passe predefinida.

trans-unit.source: The UseSystemPasswordChar property has precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de UseSystemPasswordChar tem precedência sobre a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Whenever the UseSystemPasswordChar is set to `true`, the default system password character is used and any character set by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que o UseSystemPasswordChar está definido como `true`, é utilizado o carácter de palavra-passe de sistema predefinido e qualquer caráter definido por <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>é ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in password mode because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>, UseSystemPasswordChar, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>está no modo de palavra-passe porque <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>, UseSystemPasswordChar, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>é `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>está no modo restrito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is disabled, but the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is cached so that it can be restored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> ever becomes unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: Neste modo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>é desativado mas atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>é colocado em cache para que pode ser restaurado se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>ficar sem restrições.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: Toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is a common scenario.
trans-unit.target: Ativando ou desativando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>é um cenário comum.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is shadowed while the control is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>é sombreado enquanto o controlo está no modo restrito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: From the designer perspective, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> value shown is the actual value.
trans-unit.target: Da perspetiva estruturador, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>valor apresentado é o valor real.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control should appear as the default password character; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o texto a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controlo deve ser apresentadas como a palavra-passe predefinida caráter; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: A Windows Message object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de mensagem do Windows.
